resolver

Source:

Methods

<static> fromGenerator(generator, remote, serialize, deserialize) → {resolver}

Creates a resolver giving the difference between a remote summarizer and items yielded by a generator.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
generator external:Generator the generator that will yield all items.
remote summarizer a summarizer of the remote content.
serialize serialize a serializer for items in the array.
deserialize deserialize how to deserialize byte arrays to objects.
Source:
  • resolver.js, line 115
Returns:
a resolver returning differences between the summarizer and local items.
Type
resolver

<static> fromItems(array, remote, serialize, deserialize) → {resolver}

Creates a resolver giving the difference between a remote summarizer and local items.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
array Object[] the array of items in the current state.
remote summarizer a summarizer of the remote content.
serialize serialize a serializer for items in the array.
deserialize deserialize how to deserialize byte arrays to objects.

  • resolver.js, line 103
Returns:
a resolver returning differences between the summarizer and local items.

resolver

<static> fromSummarizers(local, remote, deserialize) → {resolver}

Creates a resolver giving the difference between two summaries.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
local summarizer a summarizer of the local content.
remote summarizer a summarizer of the remote content.
deserialize deserialize how to deserialize byte arrays to objects.
Deprecated:
  • Yes
Source:
  • resolver.js, line 91
Returns:
a resolver returning differences between the provided summarizers.
